001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
004
005/**
006 * This activation function, also known as Identity or "no-activation" just returns the logit as output.
007 */
008@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
009public class Linear implements ActivationFunction {
010
011    /**
012     * {@inheritDoc}
013     */
014    @Override
015    public float activate(float logit) {
016        return logit;
017    }
018
019    /**
020     * {@inheritDoc}
021     */
022    @Override
023    public float determineGradientForOutput(float output) {
024        return 1;
025    }
026
027}
